tvdb: Rafe asks Ricky to steal a bottle of Stephen's ""water."" When Livvie ask Ricky on a date, Rafe accuses her of using Ricky to get to Stephen. Jack attacks Chris after learning Tess performed another miracle, but she defends Chris. When Chris can't help an ill Tess, Jack plans to take her back where she belongs. Jenny the hooker denies Kevin beat her. Lucy asks Ian why he accused Kevin. Ian's convinced Kevin had something to do with Jenny's beating but Lucy orders him to leave her alone. Kevin confronts Jenny and asks why she hasn't left town after he paid her to drop the charges against him, but Lucy overhears their secret.
